title: Nigerian women are freer in the south than north

content.question: Which of the following is true of women in Nigeria?

choices.label: They had more control over their own affairs under colonialism than they do now.
They enjoy more freedom in the northern region than they do in the south.
They must walk at least two spaces behind their husbands
They enjoy more freedom in the southern region than they do in the north.
They voted for the first time in 1999.

content.answer: They enjoy more freedom in the southern region than they do in the north.
